TopicTitle: [Trimaran Hull] US Navy USS Independence LCS Block II Ocean Vessel

Articles.Content:
-must read whole post before using the craft-

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This is insane. The upgraded version of the destroyer clocks in at 500 parts and 87 tons with two cruise missiles, but the max speed is over 46.8 m/s. And it can safely make hard turns even at those speeds... this ship is awesome. Armor has also been upgraded with side armor panels for the flight deck.

Missile launch instructions: (Ensure that you are as slow as possible. Turn off all ship engines and activate SAS before launch and set to full throttle. Once you switch to the missile, activate SAS, if you haven't already, and switch control to the main probe core. The missile is stable after reaching approximately 200 m/s.)

EJECT WHEELS THROUGH THE STAGE AFTER GETTING INTO WATER.

Block 2 with two cruise missiles download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/soq1m6et9pkdtte/USS%20Independence%20LCS%20BLock%20II.craft

The extreme maneuverability of the vessel. It can effortlessly make hard turns at over 46.8 m/s.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions for correcting the nav ball: Go into the center of the ship and select the shown command pod as the control here main unit.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And yes, it has a currently untested vtol landing pad.
